metadata.description: Multi-agent coordination skills for planning, orchestration, and autonomous execution with Agent Mail

plugins.name: issue-resolution
plugins.description: Systematically diagnose and fix bugs through triage, reproduction, root cause analysis, and verified fixes

plugins.name: knowledge
plugins.description: Extracts knowledge from Amp threads and updates project docs

plugins.name: orchestrator
plugins.description: Plan and coordinate multi-agent bead execution with parallel workers

plugins.name: planning
plugins.description: Generate comprehensive plans through discovery, synthesis, verification, and decomposition

plugins.name: worker
plugins.description: Execute beads autonomously within a track with context persistence via Agent Mail
